verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1893><s%> he had ended <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his sayings <S%G4487><s%> in the audience <S%G189><s%> of the people, <S%G2992><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum. <S%G2584><s%>

And a certain <S%G5100><s%> centurion's <S%G1543><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was dear <S%G1784><s%> to him, was sick, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> and ready <S%G3195><s%> to die. <S%G5053><s%>

And when he heard <S%G191><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> to him the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> beseeching <S%G2065><s%> him that he would come <S%G2064><s%> and heal <S%G1295><s%> his servant. <S%G1401><s%>

And when they came <S%G3854><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> they sought <S%G3870><s%> him instantly, <S%G4705><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> That he was worthy <S%G514><s%> for whom <S%G3739><s%> he should do <S%G3930><s%> this: <S%G5124><s%>
For he loves <S%G25><s%> our nation, <S%G1484><s%> and he has built <S%G3618><s%> us a synagogue. <S%G4864><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> with them. And when he was now <S%G2235><s%> not far <S%G3112><s%> from the house, <S%G3614><s%> the centurion <S%G1543><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%> to him, saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> trouble <S%G4660><s%> not yourself: for I am <S%G1510><s%> not worthy <S%G2425><s%> that you should enter <S%G1525><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my roof: <S%G4721><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> thought I myself <S%G1683><s%> worthy <S%G515><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you: but say <S%G2036><s%> in a word, <S%G3056><s%> and my servant <S%G3816><s%> shall be healed. <S%G2390><s%>

For I also <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> set <S%G5021><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> me soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> and I say <S%G3004><s%> to one, <S%G5129><s%> Go, <S%G4198><s%> and he goes; <S%G4198><s%> and to another, <S%G243><s%> Come, <S%G2064><s%> and he comes; <S%G2064><s%> and to my servant, <S%G1401><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> and he does <S%G4238><s%> it.

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, he marveled <S%G2296><s%> at him, and turned <S%G4762><s%> him about, <S%G4762><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to the people <S%G3793><s%> that followed <S%G190><s%> him, I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I have not found <S%G2147><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> great <S%G5118><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> no, <S%G3761><s%> not in Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
And they that were sent, <S%G3992><s%> returning <S%G5290><s%> to the house, <S%G3624><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> whole <S%G5198><s%> that had been sick. <S%G770><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass the day <S%G2250><s%> after, <S%G1836><s%> that he went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Nain; <S%G3484><s%> and many <S%G2425><s%> of his disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G4848><s%> with him, and much <S%G4183><s%> people. <S%G3793><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he came <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to the gate <S%G4439><s%> of the city, <S%G4172><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a dead <S%G2348><s%> man carried <S%G1580><s%> out, the only <S%G3439><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of his mother, <S%G3384><s%> and she was a widow: <S%G5503><s%> and much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> was with her.
And when the Lord <S%G2962><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> her, he had compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> her, and said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Weep <S%G2799><s%> not.

And he came <S%G4334><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> the bier: <S%G4673><s%> and they that bore <S%G941><s%> him stood <S%G2476><s%> still. <S%G2476><s%> And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Young <S%G3495><s%> man, <S%G3495><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Arise. <S%G1453><s%>
And he that was dead <S%G3498><s%> sat <S%G339><s%> up, and began <S%G756><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%> And he delivered <S%G1325><s%> him to his mother. <S%G3384><s%>

And there came <S%G2983><s%> a fear <S%G5401><s%> on all: <S%G537><s%> and they glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> That a great <S%G3173><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> is risen <S%G1453><s%> up among <S%G1722><s%> us; and, That God <S%G2316><s%> has visited <S%G1980><s%> his people. <S%G2992><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> rumor <S%G3056><s%> of him went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> throughout <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> and throughout <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the region <S%G4066><s%> round <S%G4066><s%> about. <S%G4066><s%>
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> showed <S%G518><s%> him of all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> things.

And John <S%G2491><s%> calling <S%G4341><s%> to him two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples <S%G3101><s%> sent them to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Are <S%G1488><s%> you he that should come? <S%G2064><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> look <S%G4328><s%> we for another? <S%G243><s%>

When the men <S%G435><s%> were come <S%G3854><s%> to him, they said, <S%G2036><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Baptist <S%G910><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> us to you, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Are <S%G1488><s%> you he that should come? <S%G2064><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> look <S%G4328><s%> we for another? <S%G243><s%>

And in that same <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> he cured <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of their infirmities <S%G3554><s%> and plagues, <S%G3148><s%> and of evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits; <S%G4151><s%> and to many <S%G4183><s%> that were blind <S%G5185><s%> he gave <S%G5483><s%> sight. <S%G991><s%>

Then <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Go <S%G4198><s%> your way, and tell <S%G518><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> things you have seen <S%G1492><s%> and heard; <S%G191><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> that the blind <S%G5185><s%> see, <S%G308><s%> the lame <S%G5560><s%> walk, <S%G4043><s%> the lepers <S%G3015><s%> are cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> the deaf <S%G2974><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> are raised, <S%G1453><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> is preached. <S%G2097><s%>
And blessed is he, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall not be offended <S%G4624><s%> in me.

And when the messengers <S%G32><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> were departed, <S%G565><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> to the people <S%G3793><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> you out into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> for to see? <S%G2300><s%> A reed <S%G2563><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> with the wind? <S%G417><s%>

But what <S%G5101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> you out for to see? <S%G1492><s%> A man <S%G444><s%> clothed <S%G294><s%> in soft <S%G3120><s%> raiment? <S%G2440><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> they which are gorgeously <S%G1741><s%> appareled, <S%G2441><s%> and live <S%G5225><s%> delicately, <S%G5172><s%> are in kings' <S%G933><s%> courts.

But what <S%G5101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> you out for to see? <S%G1492><s%> A prophet? <S%G4396><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, and much <S%G4055><s%> more <S%G4055><s%> than a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is he, of whom <S%G3739><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> my messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> your face, <S%G4383><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> your way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> you.

For I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Among <S%G1722><s%> those that are born <S%G1084><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%> there is not a greater <S%G3187><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> than John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist: <S%G910><s%> but he that is least <S%G3398><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is greater <S%G3187><s%> than he.

And all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> that heard <S%G191><s%> him, and the publicans, <S%G5057><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> being baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> of John. <S%G2491><s%>

But the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and lawyers <S%G3544><s%> rejected <S%G114><s%> the counsel <S%G1012><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> being not baptized <S%G907><s%> of him.

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Whereunto <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall I liken <S%G3666><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> generation? <S%G1074><s%> and to what <S%G5101><s%> are they like? <S%G3664><s%>

They are like <S%G3664><s%> to children <S%G3813><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in the marketplace, <S%G58><s%> and calling <S%G4377><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> We have piped <S%G832><s%> to you, and you have not danced; <S%G3738><s%> we have mourned <S%G2354><s%> to you, and you have not wept. <S%G2799><s%>

For John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> drinking <S%G4095><s%> wine; <S%G3631><s%> and you say, <S%G3004><s%> He has <S%G2192><s%> a devil. <S%G1140><s%>

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> and drinking; <S%G4095><s%> and you say, <S%G3004><s%> Behold <S%G2400><s%> a gluttonous <S%G5314><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and a drunkard, <S%G3630><s%> a friend <S%G5384><s%> of publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners! <S%G268><s%>
But wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> her children. <S%G5043><s%>

And one <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> desired <S%G2065><s%> him that he would eat <S%G5315><s%> with him. And he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Pharisee's <S%G5330><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> and sat <S%G347><s%> down <S%G347><s%> to meat.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> in the city, <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> was a sinner, <S%G268><s%> when she knew <S%G1921><s%> that Jesus sat <S%G345><s%> at <S%G345><s%> meat in the Pharisee's <S%G5330><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> brought <S%G2865><s%> an alabaster <S%G211><s%> box <S%G211><s%> of ointment, <S%G3464><s%>

And stood <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> him weeping, <S%G2799><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to wash <S%G1026><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%> with tears, <S%G1144><s%> and did wipe <S%G1591><s%> them with the hairs <S%G2359><s%> of her head, <S%G2776><s%> and kissed <S%G2705><s%> his feet, <S%G4228><s%> and anointed <S%G218><s%> them with the ointment. <S%G3464><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when the Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> had bidden <S%G2564><s%> him saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he spoke <S%G2036><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> man, if <S%G1487><s%> he were a prophet, <S%G4396><s%> would have known <S%G1097><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> and what <S%G4217><s%> manner <S%G4217><s%> of woman <S%G1135><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> is that touches <S%G680><s%> him: for she is a sinner. <S%G268><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Simon, <S%G4613><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat <S%G5100><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%> to you. And he said, <S%G5346><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> on.

There was a certain <S%G5100><s%> creditor <S%G1157><s%> which had <S%G1510><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> debtors: <S%G5533><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> owed <S%G3784><s%> five <S%G4001><s%> hundred <S%G4001><s%> pence, <S%G1220><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> fifty. <S%G4004><s%>

And when they had <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3361><s%> to pay, <S%G591><s%> he frankly <S%G5483><s%> forgave <S%G5483><s%> them both. <S%G297><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> me therefore, <S%G3767><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of them will love <S%G25><s%> him most? <S%G4119><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> I suppose <S%G5274><s%> that he, to whom <S%G3739><s%> he forgave <S%G5483><s%> most. <S%G4119><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You have rightly <S%G3723><s%> judged. <S%G2919><s%>

And he turned <S%G4762><s%> to the woman, <S%G1135><s%> and said <S%G5346><s%> to Simon, <S%G4613><s%> See <S%G991><s%> you this <S%G5026><s%> woman? <S%G1135><s%> I entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> you gave <S%G1325><s%> me no <S%G3756><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> for my feet: <S%G4228><s%> but she has washed <S%G1026><s%> my feet <S%G4228><s%> with tears, <S%G1144><s%> and wiped <S%G1591><s%> them with the hairs <S%G2359><s%> of her head. <S%G2776><s%>

You gave <S%G1325><s%> me no <S%G3756><s%> kiss: <S%G5370><s%> but this <S%G3778><s%> woman since <S%G575><s%> the time I came <S%G1525><s%> in has not ceased <S%G1257><s%> to kiss <S%G2705><s%> my feet. <S%G4228><s%>
My head <S%G2776><s%> with oil <S%G1637><s%> you did not anoint: <S%G218><s%> but this <S%G3778><s%> woman has anointed <S%G218><s%> my feet <S%G4228><s%> with ointment. <S%G3464><s%>

Why <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5484><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Her sins, <S%G266><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are many, <S%G4183><s%> are forgiven; <S%G863><s%> for she loved <S%G25><s%> much: <S%G4183><s%> but to whom <S%G3739><s%> little <S%G3641><s%> is forgiven, <S%G863><s%> the same loves <S%G25><s%> little. <S%G3641><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Your sins <S%G266><s%> are forgiven. <S%G863><s%>

And they that sat <S%G4873><s%> at <S%G345><s%> meat with him began <S%G756><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> that forgives <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> also? <S%G2532><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to the woman, <S%G1135><s%> Your faith <S%G4102><s%> has saved <S%G4982><s%> you; go <S%G4198><s%> in peace. <S%G1515><s%>
